Uses of Interface
jcckit.util.ConfigData

Packages that use ConfigData
jcckit.util Utility classes.  
 

Uses of ConfigData in jcckit.util
 

Classes in jcckit.util that implement ConfigData
 class AppletBasedConfigData
          Implementation of FlatConfigData based on java.applet.Applet.
 class ConfigParametersBasedConfigData
          An implementation of ConfigData based on two instances of ConfigParameters.
 class FlatConfigData
          An implementation of ConfigData based on a flat representation of the hierachically organized key-value pairs.
 class PropertiesBasedConfigData
          Implementation of FlatConfigData based on java.util.Properties.
 

Methods in jcckit.util that return ConfigData
protected  ConfigData PropertiesBasedConfigData.createConfigData(java.lang.String path)
          Returns a new instance of PropertiesBasedConfigData for the specified full path.
protected  ConfigData AppletBasedConfigData.createConfigData(java.lang.String path)
           
 ConfigData ConfigData.getNode(java.lang.String key)
          Returns the ConfigData object associated with this key.
 ConfigData ConfigParametersBasedConfigData.getNode(java.lang.String key)
          Returns the ConfigData object associated with this key.
 ConfigData FlatConfigData.getNode(java.lang.String key)
          Returns the ConfigData object associated with this key.
protected abstract  ConfigData FlatConfigData.createConfigData(java.lang.String path)
          Returns the FlatConfigData object for the specified full path.
 

Constructors in jcckit.util with parameters of type ConfigData
ConfigParameters(ConfigData configData)
          Creates an instance from the specified ConfigData object.
